name: Ars Ira
description:
Test your platforming mettle in Ars Ira! How quickly can you find the exit?

Learn abilities that will help you navigate the library, search for secret collectibles and challenge your records in this brutal platformer.

Game by Jamie Rollo, with Music by Jared Hahn.

Ars Ira was made for Hectic Games Jam #5 with the theme 'Alma Mater'
